## Color Reference

### Match Type Colors
- **Exact (100%)**: 
  - Background: Light Green (#E8F5E9)
  - Badge: âœ“ EXACT
  
- **Fuzzy (80-99%)**:
  - Background: Light Orange (#FFF3E0)
  - Badge: ~ FUZZY
  
- **No Match**:
  - Background: Light Red (#FFEBEE)
  - Badge: âœ— NO MATCH

## Workflow Visualization

### Single Segment Flow
```
User clicks
"Process Single"
    â†“
Match pane shows
"Waiting for..."
    â†“
AutoFingers copies
from memoQ
    â†“
Looks up translation
    â†“
Match pane displays:
- Source text
- Match % & type
- Target translation
    â†“
Translator reviews
and confirms
    â†“
AutoFingers inserts
translation
```

### Loop Mode Flow
```
User clicks
"Start Loop Mode"
    â†“
Begins processing
segments one-by-one
    â†“
For each segment:
    â”œâ”€ Copies source
    â”œâ”€ Looks up match
    â”œâ”€ Match pane updates
    â”‚   - Shows current match
    â”‚   - Displays match type
    â”‚   - Shows percentage
    â”œâ”€ Inserts translation
    â””â”€ Moves to next
    â†“
Progress bar increments
    â†“
Continues until:
- Limit reached
- No match found (if not skipping)
- User stops loop
```
